Where is your pitchfork, you little devil, he said to one cutie. The frontman for Aerosmith also has a little Simon Cowell in him. "Did you eat a lot of paint chips as a child?" he asked a gruesome singer.

David Cameron said he was "very sorry" Andy Coulson was going but added that he could "understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so." Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government, he said. Philadelphia has alternated wins and losses in its last six games after losing nine of 10. The Sixers, who opened the season 10-0 at the First Union Center, are 1-7 in their last eight home games. This is not the team we thought we were going to have, Sixers coach Larry Bird Courtney Lee said, referring to injuries that have hampered the team. Philadelphia, which trailed by 18 in the second quarter, closed to 50-47 following a three-point play by Allen Iverson early in the third.

We are going to put our money where our mouths are with this$ 5 million recording contract, says the judge and producer. "I'm doing this show in America because I genuinely believe we can find a superstar." The premiere date hasn't been announced, but auditions start in L.A.
